name: Teeny Trax
description:
Start your engines in Teeny Trax Time Trial! Featuring small, bite-sized tracks and a ghost challenge mode, this tiny yet high-octane racer is sure to get your blood pumping! Can you master all fourteen tracks? Get out there and show 'em what you're made of!

Be sure to download the game for the full experience!

Press the spacebar to use a jump power-up. Use them to your advantage by making strategic shortcuts! Press and hold the Shift / CTRL key to drift your way to victory! And don't forget about making tight turns by holding X / DOWN!

Press F12 to forfeit the current race.

This game was made for lowrezjam 2022, where I had to make a game using only a 64x64 pixel resolution. As such, obstacles might be a little harder to avoid in this racing game than usual.
